(收音机静静地嘶嘶作响，偶尔伴随着嘈杂的干扰声).Translation: (The radio quietly crackles, occasionally accompanied by loud static interference)

……紧急新闻……断断续续的报告显示，多个区域爆发了不明病毒……人们变得极度暴力，.Translation: … Breaking news… intermittent reports indicate that an unidentified virus has broken out in multiple areas… people are becoming extremely violent and feel no pain… please evacuate immediately, do not contact anyone… remember to stay calm and seek safe shelter…

(声音突然被打断，随后又继续).Translation: (The voice is suddenly interrupted, then continues)

……这是一个前所未有的危机……政府已经启动紧急状态……所有居民请保持警惕，关闭窗.Translation: … This is an unprecedented crisis… the government has declared a state of emergency… all residents are advised to stay vigilant, close windows and doors, and stock up on food and water… we will continue to update you, do not go outside…

(收音机声渐渐消失，留下一片死寂).Translation: (The sound of the radio gradually fades away, leaving a dead silence)

地图上显示这里就是要潜入的地方.Translation: The map shows this is the place to infiltrate.

外面雨太大了，能见度过低.Translation: It’s raining too heavily outside, visibility is too low.

得想个办法快点打开这栅栏.Translation: I need to find a way to open this barrier quickly.
